title: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Chasiv Yar, Klischiyivka and Andriyivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviati...
content: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Chasiv Yar, Klischiyivka and Andriyivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Chasiv Yar, Oleksandro-Shultyne of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
